00013 SmartLocker::SmartLocker( LockableObject& LockableObjectToManage, bool LockAtInit /* = true */ )
00014     : ManagedLoackableObject(LockableObjectToManage)
00015 {
00016     // Initiate the LockCount
00017     LockCount = 0;
00018
00019     // Here, we are ready to work
00020     if ( LockAtInit == true )
00021     {
00022         Lock();
00023     }

00029 SmartLocker::SmartLocker( const LockableObject& LockableObjectToManage, bool LockAtInit /* = true */ )
00030     : ManagedLoackableObject(dynamic_cast<LockableObject&>((LockableObject&)LockableObjectToManage))

00046 SmartLocker::~SmartLocker()
00047 {
00048     if ( LockCount > 0 )
00049     {
00050         // OmiscidError( "SmartLocker::SmartLocker~: warning object not unlock before exiting the scope\n" );
00051         while( LockCount > 0 )
00052         {
00053             ManagedLoackableObject.Unlock();
00054             LockCount--;
00055         }
00056     }
00057 }
00058
00062 bool SmartLocker::Lock()
00063 {
00064     if ( ManagedLoackableObject.Lock() == true )
00065     {
00066         LockCount++;
00067         return true;
00068     }
00069     return false;
00070 }
00071
00075 bool SmartLocker::Unlock()
00076 {
00077     if ( LockCount == 0 )
00078     {
00079         OmiscidError( "SmartLocker::Unlock : the object is not lock." );
00080         return false;
00081     }
00082     if ( ManagedLoackableObject.Unlock() == true )
00083     {
00084         LockCount--;
00085         return true;
00086     }
00087     return false;
00088 }
